Talk1002:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I saw <clr:0000>something glowing<clr:ffff> in the <clr:0000>sky to the
southeast<clr:ffff>, but when the sky got lighter,
I couldn't make it out anymore.
I'm worn out from straining to see it
all night, so I'm going to take a break
at the stable.
You look like you've been working too
hard. While I admire your dedication,
be sure to rest properly.
Talk1010:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>Now, that is just far too big to be a
star...isn't it?
Talk1011:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Could it have possibly...been a bird?
No, impossible. Birds don't glow.
Talk1012:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>Unless I'm mistaken, I think it was
over there...wasn't it?
Talk1006:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You'd better find a place out of the
rain, and quick!
Talk1013:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Ah, sorry.


I'm a bit preoccupied trying to make out
something I saw glowing in the sky to
the southeast. But I can't see it now.
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><sp:0:2:2:5000>It was glowing. I know it was. Maybe it'll come back
out once it gets dark...

<sp:3:0:2:0c01><sp:0:2:2:6400>Sorry again. Lost in thought. I have a duty
to report anything about sky islands to<clr:0000>
Kakariko Village<clr:ffff> in Necluda to the east.
Talk1007:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I saw <clr:0000>something glowing<clr:ffff> in the <clr:0000>sky to
the southeast<clr:ffff>.

In my official capacity as a member of
the Zonai Survey Team, I must discover
exactly what it is!
Talk1014:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>It couldn't have been a bird, could it?
Of course not...birds don't glow.
Talk1015:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think>Hmm, when the weather is this bad, I just
can't make out much, if anything!
Talk1009:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Ah, sorry.


There's something glowing in the sky in
the southeast, and I'm determined to find
out what it is.
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>It's obviously beyond the scope, or even
the reach, of a field survey. No, my eyes
probe the sky.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>I have a duty to report anything about sky
islands to <clr:0000>our group in Kakariko Village<clr:ffff>
off in Necluda to the east.
Talk1001:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>To think that woman from earlier was with
the Yiga Clan. Just imagine what would
have happened if I'd gone with her!
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Now that I know the truth, I won't be
deceived so easily again.

I'm reassured enough to keep
investigating the <clr:0000>sky islands<clr:ffff>.
Thank you!
Talk1018:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think>I'll get on with my investigation after
the rain clears up.
